name: Mini Gun the Mini Game
description:
Just a tiny game I made using Godot game engine. My best time is 12 seconds, try and beat me if you can. If you did, post your time in the comments. There are thousands of bugs, i'm sorry.

Thanks to @rvros.itch.io for the Adventurer art and @aamatniekss.itch.io for the tileset and background. <3

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Q - Change Gun

Left Mouse Button - Shoot
